[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [SubtreeDirectiveOptions](../fast-element.subtreedirectiveoptions/index.html) &gt; [selector](../fast-element.subtreedirectiveoptions.selector/index.html)

## SubtreeDirectiveOptions.selector property

When subtrees are observed, a query selector is required to indicate which of potentially many nodes should be assigned to the property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
selector: string;
```
